getInvisibleRect function

Rect getInvisibleRect (Rect rect)

Implementation 

Rect getInvisibleRect(Rect rect) {
  return Rect.fromLTRB(rect.left, rect.top - 24,
      rect.right, rect.bottom - 24);
}
flutter_introduction_tooltip 0.0.1
